name: Pythagoras' Perpetual Motion Machine
description: Head to the top of the tower, guided by a mysterious voice... 40 stages that should leave you with a fulfilling sense of achievement. Play with your knowledge, cunning and sparks of brilliance as your only weapon. What do the messages mean? Who am I? What purpose does this tower serve...?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or later x86 and x64 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6300 or equivalent Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 or equivalent Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or later x86 and x64 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 or equivalent Storage: 500 MB available space
